experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description: Launched a university-focused dorm service platform connecting students with local businesses. Scaled to 80+ daily users and generated 5,500 ETB revenue in 2 months.
experiences.impact: Proved ability to bootstrap, validate, and scale products.

experiences.title: PyQt5 Game Developer
experiences.description: Developed a trivia game to support Sunday school education, optimized to run smoothly on limited hardware.
experiences.impact: Increased student engagement with interactive learning.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Built a cloud-based finance system managing accounting workflows with an SQL backend.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description: Startup delivering third-party projects in ML, computer vision, and advanced web solutions.
experiences.impact: Expanded technical scope while learning project management.

experiences.title: Lead Developer
experiences.description: Leading Ethiopia’s first EMR system integrated with National ID (Fayda).
experiences.impact: Digitized patient care and enabled secure ID verification for healthcare.

experiences.title: Open Source Contributor
experiences.description: Contributed to Ethiopia’s first national eKYC platform integrated with Fayda.
experiences.impact: Enabled secure digital identity verification for national services.
